attachments.title: Former New York mayor Giuliani explains why Noriega's Call of Duty lawsuit is 'absurd'
attachments.text: Activision today announced that former New York City mayor and U.S. Attorney Rudy Giuliani will serve as co-counsel in defending the company against the lawsuit filed by former Panamanian dictator...
attachments.fallback: Polygon: Former New York mayor Giuliani explains why Noriega's Call of Duty lawsuit is 'absurd'

text: Also the first time I've heard Activision referred to so positively. "A good, decent American company"
